title: Quality product
body:
I’ve been using the CeraVe Foaming Facial Cleanser for a few weeks now, and I’m honestly impressed with how well it works. My skin feels really clean after washing, but never tight or dry just soft and refreshed. It removes makeup, sunscreen, and oil easily without stripping my skin barrier.
What I love most is the gentle formula. It has ceramides and niacinamide, which help keep my skin balanced and hydrated. I also have sensitive/combination skin, and this cleanser doesn’t cause any irritation or breakouts. The pump bottle is convenient and lasts a long time, so it’s great value for the price.
If you’re looking for a dermatologist-recommended cleanser that truly delivers, I highly recommend giving this one a try. It’s become a staple in my skincare routine!

title: Gentle, Effective, and Perfect for Daily Use!
body:
I’ve tried countless face washes over the years, but the CeraVe Foaming Facial Cleanser is one I keep coming back to — and for good reason. It strikes the perfect balance between cleansing thoroughly and being gentle on the skin.

The texture is lightweight and foams just enough without feeling harsh or soapy. It removes oil, sunscreen, and light makeup easily without leaving my skin feeling tight or stripped. I love that it contains ceramides and hyaluronic acid, so it actually supports my skin barrier instead of damaging it like other cleansers I’ve tried.

I have combination/sensitive skin, and this cleanser keeps my face clean and calm with zero irritation or redness — no breakouts either. Even my dermatologist has recommended it!

If you're looking for a reliable, no-nonsense cleanser that does exactly what it promises, you can’t go wrong with this one. Affordable, effective, and genuinely skin-friendly — it’s now a staple in my routine!

title: Excellent Cleanser for Oily Skin — Gentle but Effective!
body:
I’ve been using this foaming cleanser for a while now, and it has made a noticeable difference in my skin. It removes excess oil without leaving my face feeling tight or dry. I love that it contains hyaluronic acid, ceramides, and niacinamide, which help keep my skin balanced and healthy.

The formula is fragrance-free and gentle, so it's perfect for daily use, even for sensitive skin. It foams nicely, rinses clean, and really helps control shine throughout the day. The 16-ounce size is also a great value and lasts a long time.

If you have oily or combination skin and want a cleanser that cleans deeply without stripping, this is an excellent choice. Highly recommended!

title: MUST BUY! Best for all skins!
body: I’m a diehard, Sarah V foaming facial cleanser fan. I’ve used many cleansers in the past. This is by far the most effective moisturizing makes my skin soft is the best quality and was recommended by my dermatologist and I have to agree. I will say this is good for all types of skin And is extremely effective. I only have to do one face wash for my face to feel clean. It also does remove my make up. I love it so much. I keep one in the shower and one at the sink. Product is colorless.

title: Gentle yet powerful for my skin
body:
Gentle Yet Powerful for Oily Skin!
This cleanser is a lifesaver for oily, acne-prone skin. It foams nicely, cleans deeply, and never leaves my face feeling tight or dry. The blend of hyaluronic acid, ceramides, and niacinamide keeps my skin balanced and smooth. No fragrance, no irritation - just clean, healthy skin. A must-have in my daily routine! Trust me.

title: Cleans well, but lingers...
body: I keep searching for a gentle foaming cleanser that will work well with my oily skin. I really wanted to like this cleanser, but it feels like it's hard to get off my skin. Even if it looks washed off, it still feels like it leaves a residue and that drives me nuts. I went from washing my face in the sink with it to only using it in the shower, so I can make sure I get it completely off. It does the job and has a mild scent that doesn't bother me, and it does feel gentle on my skin. It also lasts a long while for the size of the bottle. But due to the residue issue, I won't be buying it again.

title: Works well leaves skin feeling good
body: Both my teenage kids and myself use this CeraVe foaming facial cleaner. It works great on both boys and girls. No feminine or masculine smell, just clean. Leaves skin feeling so nice and clean in my opinion. Suds nicely, washes off easily. I've used this for a couple years now and am still just as happy with it as I was at first. This bottle is a good, big size and a good value for the money.

title: Great Product!
body: My daughter and son use this daily. They both love how their skin feels afterwards. It cleans really well, but doesn't dry their skin out. This is the only one they will use. Great product!

title: The best
body:
Love that the CeraVe Foaming Facial Cleanser is formulated with skin-friendly ceramides, hyaluronic acid, and niacinamide to support the skin’s barrier and retain moisture while cleansing; to me this means more bang for your buck in a face wash.

However, because it’s a foaming gel aimed at normal to oily skin, if you have drier skin it can feel slightly drying if not followed by adequate hydration. I personally have combination skin but my main concern right now is large pores and acne in some areas so I am using this to control oil production and calm redness. This is light but still lathers, I find it able to remove makeup. However I do alternate days where I double cleanse with something more abrasive to ensure I’m really getting all the grime and dead skin cells sluffed off.

title: Great Cleanser
body:
This cleanser leaves my skin very clean without feeling tight. It’s gentle, effective, perfect for oily skin, and it lasts a long time. I highly recommend it.

Este limpiador deja la piel muy limpia pero sin sensación de tirantez. Es suave, efectivo y perfecto para piel grasa. Lo recomiendo muchísimo.
